title: How to Make Violet Fizz

steps.headline: Fill the cocktail shaker halfway with the ice.
Pour in the gin, lemon juice, crème de violette.
Shake well for about 1 minute or until all is well combined.
steps.description: The egg white should turn frothy, indicating that shaking can stop.

steps.headline: Using a cocktail strainer, strain the drink into the ice-filled glass.
Fill the rest of the glass with mineral water.
steps.description: Garnish with fresh violet flowers if you have them.

text: Fill the cocktail shaker halfway with the ice.  Pour in the gin, lemon juice, crème de violette. Add the egg white. Shake well for about 1 minute or until all is well combined. The egg white should turn frothy, indicating that shaking can stop. Using a cocktail strainer, strain the drink into the ice-filled glass.  Fill the rest of the glass with mineral water. Garnish with fresh violet flowers if you have them.
